title: Get an adjustable sun lounger for just £310!
content:
Whether you’re working on your tan or having an afternoon siesta, a sun lounger is essential if you want to make the most of the warm weather. Just take the Lisbon Lounger from Only Oak Furniture. With an adjustable back and a waterproof cushion, it’s the perfect way to enjoy a moment of blissful relaxation in your garden. What’s more, if you take advantage of this exclusive deal, you can get yours for £310 instead of the usual £339! Simply enter the code LisbonSunSpecial at the checkout to receive your £29 discount.

Claim your offer

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Only Oak Furniture is a family-run business that sells quality products at low prices. The brand is known for its premium customer service and always offers free delivery and returns, so you can shop with total peace of mind.

To get your Royal Lisbon Sun Lounger for £310, just enter the code LisbonSunSpecial at the checkout. The specifications are as follows:

  • Made from synthetic rattan
  • Cream coloured
  • Aluminium frame
  • Weather Shield Cushions included

Ready for a summer of relaxation?

Claim your offer

Offer ends 15/10/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
